object.property: Switch Brocade FC port perfomance monitoring.
Switch Brocade FC port perfomance monitoring.

# change severity according to snmp status OK from datetime import datetime newStatuskey = int(float(getattr(evt,'current', '0'))) if component is not None and evt.eventKey == 'OpStatus_OpStatus|OpStatusChange': statusField = 'OpStatus' status_map = {0: 'unknown',1: 'online',2: 'offline',3: 'testing',4: 'faulty'} evt.summary = evt.summary+" (OpStatus: 0: 'unknown',1: 'online',2: 'offline',3: 'testing',4: 'faulty')" newStatus=status_map.get(newStatuskey,None) if newStatus == 'online': evt.severity = 0 elif component.LinkState=='disabled': evt.severity = 0 #evt._action = "drop" elif component is not None and evt.eventKey == 'LinkStatus_LinkStatus|LinkStatusChange': statusField = 'LinkState' status_map = {1: 'enabled',2: 'disabled',3: 'loopback'} evt.summary = evt.summary+" (LinkStatus: 1: 'enabled',2: 'disabled',3: 'loopback')" newStatus=status_map.get(newStatuskey,None) Status=getattr(component,statusField, None) #log.info(str(component.portnumber)+" - "+"component="+component.portname) #log.info(str(component.portnumber)+" - "+"Status="+Status) #log.info(str(component.portnumber)+" - "+"newStatus="+newStatus) #log.info(str(component.portnumber)+" - "+"statusField="+statusField) #log.info(str(component.portnumber)+" - "+"evt.eventKey="+evt.eventKey) #log.info(str(component.portnumber)+" - "+"evt._action="+evt._action) if Status != newStatus: @transact def updateDb(): setattr(component, statusField, newStatus) component.statusdate = datetime.strftime(datetime.now(), "%Y.%m.%d %H:%M:%S") updateDb() elif statusField == 'LinkState': #Fix bug of Zenoss evt generation evt._action = "drop"
